name: FPS Concept Map
description:
To view the full Level Design Document, please click here.

This is a concept map for a first-person shooter level that is fast-paced in nature and design. Developed in Unreal Engine 5, this map features many points for tactical gameplay to occur, with a number of cover and vantage points for players to engage in combat. 

Available for Windows and MacOS.

System Requirements

Windows

  • 4 Core Processor or Better
  • 16GB RAM Recommended
  • GTX 1660Ti or Better

MacOS

  • 2018 MacBooks [Intel Based]
  • All ARM MacBooks [M1, M1 Pro / Max, M2, M2 Pro / Max]
  • 16GB RAM or Better

Development System Configuration

  • AMD Ryzen 7 - 2700X
  • 32GB RAM
  • RTX 2060
